summary: March 22 is the 81st day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Virginia Oldoini, Countess of Castiglione , better known as La Castiglione, was born to an aristocratic family from La Spezia. She was a 19th-century Italian aristocrat who achieved notoriety as a mistress of Emperor Napoleon III of France. She was also a significant figure in the early history of photography.
title: Virginia Oldoini, Countess of Castiglione
